import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; export default function Weather() { let weatherData = { city: "Toronto", temperature: -10, date: "Monday 11:00", description: "Sunny", imgUrl: "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/2580/2580627.png", humidity: 68, wind: 5 }; return (

{weatherData.city}

{weatherData.date}
{weatherData.temperature} °C|°F
Feels like 0°C
Wind 8km/h E
Pressure 1013.55hPa
Humidity Low
This project was coded by Kristina Laktiushkina and is open-sourced on GitHub
); }
